title: Client text problem
body: I have problem with text on client i cant see something like nicks of players price of champs i cant see my nickname and when i get in lobby i cant see chat pls someone help but in game everything is ok just its a problem with client http://prntscr.com/i2tp3v there is a picture of problem

replies.body:
Try running a client repair (gear button up the top right > initiate full repair).

If that doesn't work try reinstalling with the Hextech Repair Tool:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends
